utilities.initialise_db.Connect()[source]

Connects to the MySQL database.

Returns:

mysql.connector.connection.MySQLConnection: The database connection object.

utilities.initialise_db.create_db()[source]

Creates the database and necessary tables/views in the database. Inserts initial data into the tables.
